comment.body:
Wczoraj wieczorem jak sprawdzałem, to u mnie problem z logowaniem był nawet z wyłączonym AdGuardem.
Wyglądało to w ten sposób, że czasami po zalogowaniu pokazywało, że jestem nadal niezalogowany.
Co któreś odświeżenie strony (bez podawania danych do logowania) wyświetlało, że jestem zalogowany, a po kolejnym odświeżeniu już nie, tak w kółko.
Dzisiaj już nie potrafię tego odtworzyć i logowanie działa prawidłowo nawet z włączonym AdGuardem.

@FadeMind Nadal masz problem z logowaniem?

issue.title: Diagnostics Page

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

v0.107.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome, other(specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

i run the Diagnostics page from vaultwarden

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots


![Image 321](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/101245521/187724732-1a8de2be-9d17-4c2e-8602-c81fddeb15d5.png)

with adgard as dns Server i cant get server latest, when i take 1.1.1.1 as dns Server, it will go.
What is the problem. THX
D

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://smbiz.asahi.com/article/14708613](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsmbiz.asahi.com%2Farticle%2F14708613) ### Comment > 赤い丸の中がすり抜けた広告だと思われます。 > Adblockアプリを用いた閲覧でもすり抜けてきました。 ### Screenshots
